card.name: Aether Shockwave
card.property: Choose one — • Tap all Spirits. • Tap all non-Spirit creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The strain upon the veil between worlds began to show near the end of the Kami War. Strange happenings that neither side could control lashed out across Kamigawa." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Araba Mothrider
card.property: Flying Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My finest creations are fashioned after the moths of Eiganjo. They fly higher, faster, and more gracefully than any of my own designs." —Noboru, master kitemaker

card.name: Celestial Kirin
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, destroy all permanents with that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All bow at its visitation—some in awe, some in honor, some in fear.

card.name: Charge Across the Araba
card.property: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

card.name: Cowed by Wisdom
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.

card.name: Curtain of Light
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared. Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Paint gold upon the wind, Shape the wind into a shield, And vanish behind the brightness." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

card.name: Descendant of Kiyomaro
card.property: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Descendant of Kiyomaro gets +1/+2 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of Kiyomaro flows in my veins. He did not let Eiganjo fall and neither shall I."

card.name: Eiganjo Free-Riders
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return a white creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The air filled with dust and the sound of wingbeats. The mothriders had joined the fray." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Enduring Ideal
card.property: Search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

card.name: Ghost-Lit Redeemer
card.property: {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life. Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Ghost-Lit Redeemer: You gain 4 life.

card.name: Hail of Arrows
card.property: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo." —General Takeno

card.name: Hand of Honor
card.property: Protection from black Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that brings it to life."

card.name: Inner-Chamber Guard
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seems that each time I visit Lord Konda his guards are more on edge, perhaps even more eager for the war to reach them." —Masako the Humorless

card.name: Kataki, War's Wage
card.property: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes." —Kenzo the Hardhearted

card.name: Kitsune Bonesetter
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Activate this ability only if you have more cards in hand than each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He kept generations whole before the Kami War, and now he turns his century of wisdom to healing the latest casualties." —Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

card.name: Kitsune Dawnblade
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Kitsune Dawnblade enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Kitsune Loreweaver
card.property: {1} {W}: Kitsune Loreweaver gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know your history. The lessons of the past will shield you in times of doubt."

card.name: Kiyomaro, First to Stand
card.property: Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance. Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.

card.name: Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker
card.property: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch over my father. Tell him I'm safe, but I won't come home until I find out how to bring him back to his senses, and Kamigawa is again at peace." —Michiko Konda, last letter to General Takeno

card.name: Moonwing Moth
card.property: Flying {W}: Moonwing Moth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Night wings sprinkled with dust Of a thousand soldiers dead And a thousand cities fallen." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

card.name: Nikko-Onna
card.property: When Nikko-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Nikko-Onna to its owner's hand.

card.name: Plow Through Reito
card.property: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The paths of the kami crisscrossed Kamigawa like scars left by a maddened surgeon.

card.name: Presence of the Wise
card.property: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humbly I bow. Silently I wait. Deeply I listen."

card.name: Promise of Bunrei
card.property: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

card.name: Pure Intentions
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Pure Intentions, return Pure Intentions from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Reverence
card.property: Creatures with power 2 or less can't attack you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Despite the massive forces that allied against him, Konda never once believed he would lose the Kami War." —Masako the Humorless

card.name: Rune-Tail, Kitsune Ascendant
card.property: When you have 30 or more life, flip Rune-Tail, Kitsune Ascendant.

alternate.name: Rune-Tail's Essence
alternate.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

card.name: Shinen of Stars' Light
card.property: First strike Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Shinen of Stars' Light: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Spiritual Visit
card.property: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token. Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Torii Watchward
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Cloudhoof Kirin
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may have target player put the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Cut the Earthly Bond
card.property: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Descendant of Soramaro
card.property: {1} {U}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soramaro speaks through me. Listen! And I will tell the wisdom of the ancestors."

card.name: Dreamcatcher
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful where your mind wanders. Even in the quietest moments, the kami are listening, and your thoughts give them shape." —Lady Azami

card.name: Erayo, Soratami Ascendant
card.property: Flying Whenever the fourth spell of a turn is cast, flip Erayo, Soratami Ascendant.

alternate.name: Erayo's Essence
alternate.property: Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, counter that spell.

card.name: Eternal Dominion
card.property: Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Evermind
card.property: (Nonexistent mana costs can't be paid.) Draw a card. Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Freed from the Real
card.property: Enchant creature {U}: Tap enchanted creature. {U}: Untap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

card.name: Ghost-Lit Warder
Ideas Unbound
card.property: Draw three cards. Discard three cards at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The apprentice stared in puzzlement. "But Master, you finished writing those spells just yesterday. Don't you remember?" The jushi's heart froze.

card.name: Kaho, Minamo Historian
card.property: When Kaho, Minamo Historian enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library. {X}, {T}: You may cast a card with converted mana cost X exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick." —Toshiro Umezawa

card.name: Kiri-Onna
card.property: When Kiri-Onna enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kiri-Onna to its owner's hand.

card.name: Meishin, the Mind Cage
card.property: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's dangerous indeed to be lost in someone else's thoughts.

card.name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
card.property: Defender Your maximum hand size is increased by one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

card.name: Moonbow Illusionist
card.property: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Murmurs from Beyond
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.

card.name: Oboro Breezecaller
card.property: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel their unnatural influence in the weary, weeping land. Do they care nothing for the creatures who walk below their clouds?" —Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

card.name: Oboro Envoy
card.property: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Oppressive Will
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Minamo was abandoned, its younger students found themselves thrust into a war beyond their skill with talents beyond their control.

card.name: Overwhelming Intellect
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Rushing-Tide Zubera
card.property: When Rushing-Tide Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cut off from the kakuriyo by the destruction of their honden, the zubera sought new ways to bring their secrets home.

card.name: Sakashima the Impostor
card.property: You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Sakashima the Impostor, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Secretkeeper
card.property: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Secretkeeper gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is all the things that humanity was not meant to know.

card.name: Shape Stealer
card.property: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, change Shape Stealer's base power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stand back. I know just what to do." —Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker

card.name: Shifting Borders
card.property: Exchange control of two target lands. Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Shinen of Flight's Wings
card.property: Flying Channel — {U}, Discard Shinen of Flight's Wings: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Soramaro, First to Dream
card.property: Flying Soramaro, First to Dream's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. {4}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card.

card.name: Trusted Advisor
card.property: Your maximum hand size is increased by two. At the beginning of your upkeep, return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of Minamo's students claimed he was as old as the knowledge he dispensed.

card.name: Twincast
card.property: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you have to search for inspiration, and sometimes it's right there in front of you.

card.name: Akuta, Born of Ash
card.property: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may sacrifice a Swamp. If you do, return Akuta, Born of Ash from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Choice of Damnations
card.property: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is a series of choices between bad and worse." —Toshiro Umezawa

card.name: Death Denied
card.property: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

card.name: Death of a Thousand Stings
card.property: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Death of a Thousand Stings from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Deathknell Kami
card.property: Flying {2}: Deathknell Kami gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Soulshift 1 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Deathmask Nezumi
card.property: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Deathmask Nezumi gets +2/+1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We had him cornered, we did . . . and, well, you know what they say about rats." —Araba patrol survivor

card.name: Exile into Darkness
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Exile into Darkness from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Footsteps of the Goryo
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the case of violent deaths, kami offered a chance for revenge if the deceased offered up its corpse as a host to the invading kami.

card.name: Ghost-Lit Stalker
Gnat Miser
card.property: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nezumi insect-shamans enjoyed solitary lives, which was fortunate since no other nezumi could stand to live within half a mile of their foul stench.

card.name: Hand of Cruelty
card.property: Protection from white Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that delivers death."

card.name: Infernal Kirin
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kirin bellowed—an echoing, twisted parody of its once-inspirational call.

card.name: Kagemaro, First to Suffer
card.property: Kagemaro, First to Suffer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. {B}, Sacrifice Kagemaro: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Kagemaro's Clutch
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mist was thick, cloying, and constricting. Shiro fought his way to fresh air only to look back and see his comrades fallen on the battlefield behind him.

card.name: Kami of Empty Graves
card.property: Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Kemuri-Onna
card.property: When Kemuri-Onna enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kemuri-Onna to its owner's hand.

card.name: Kiku's Shadow
card.property: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Me? No, I'm not going to kill you. I won't even lay a finger on you. I promise." —Kiku, Night's Flower

card.name: Kuon, Ogre Ascendant
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, flip Kuon, Ogre Ascendant.

alternate.name: Kuon's Essence
alternate.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Kuro's Taken
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Kuro's Taken.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simple bargains are the most tempting, and oni bargains are the simplest of all: eternal life for eternal service.

card.name: Locust Miser
card.property: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by two.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're numerous, attack in swarms, and are always hungry. No wonder we rats hold such a kinship with them."

card.name: Maga, Traitor to Mortals
card.property: Maga, Traitor to Mortals enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Maga enters the battlefield, target player loses life equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Measure of Wickedness
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Measure of Wickedness and you lose 8 life. Whenever another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, target opponent gains control of Measure of Wickedness.

card.name: Neverending Torment
card.property: Search target player's library for X cards, where X is the number of cards in your hand, and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: One with Nothing
card.property: Discard your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When nothing remains, everything is equally possible.

card.name: Pain's Reward
card.property: Each player may bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of any number. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and draws four cards.

card.name: Raving Oni-Slave
card.property: When Raving Oni-Slave enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you lose 3 life if you don't control a Demon.

card.name: Razorjaw Oni
card.property: Black creatures can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It gnashed its teeth, and the battlefield filled with the screech of blade striking blade.

card.name: Shinen of Fear's Chill
card.property: Shinen of Fear's Chill can't block. Channel — {1}{B}, Discard Shinen of Fear's Chill: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Sink into Takenuma
card.property: Sweep — Return any number of Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Target player discards a card for each Swamp returned this way.

card.name: Skull Collector
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a black creature you control to its owner's hand. {1}{B}: Regenerate Skull Collector.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your blood I'll use. Your skull I'll keep."

card.name: Adamaro, First to Desire
card.property: Adamaro, First to Desire's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the opponent with the most cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware Adamaro! In him all pain and anger is perfected." —Isao, Enlightened Bushi

card.name: Akki Drillmaster
card.property: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What part of 'hayaku ikee!' did you not understand?"

card.name: Akki Underling
card.property: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Akki Underling gets +2/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I lost my hounds in the war and thus found myself employing akki as servants. I found their training to be remarkably similar." —Kensuke, houndmaster

card.name: Barrel Down Sokenzan
card.property: Sweep — Return any number of Mountains you control to their owner's hand. Barrel Down Sokenzan deals damage to target creature equal to twice the number of Mountains returned this way.

card.name: Burning-Eye Zubera
card.property: When Burning-Eye Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, Burning-Eye Zubera deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Captive Flame
card.property: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

card.name: Feral Lightning
card.property: Create three 3/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They moved like apes, but a thousand times swifter, prying into every corner, leaving pawprints of ash.

card.name: Gaze of Adamaro
card.property: Gaze of Adamaro deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wherever it looked, it saw destruction—the wake of its own gaze.

card.name: Ghost-Lit Raider
Glitterfang
card.property: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Glitterfang to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through the veil's rip spilled hundreds of minor kami, rushing over the battlefield like embers from a kicked campfire. Then they were gone." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Godo's Irregulars
card.property: {R}: Godo's Irregulars deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Godo trained their muscles and honed their skills, but he left their hearts wild and empty.

card.name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
card.property: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hidetsugu never relinquished a grudge. He let it burn within him, gathering ever greater intensity until the final moment of vengeance.

card.name: Homura, Human Ascendant
card.property: Homura, Human Ascendant can't block. When Homura dies, return it to the battlefield flipped.

alternate.name: Homura's Essence
alternate.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Iizuka the Ruthless
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) {2}{R}, Sacrifice a Samurai: Samurai creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Inner Fire
card.property: Add {R} for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heart of Sokenzan, I call to you! Lend me your fire."

card.name: Into the Fray
card.property: Target creature attacks this turn if able. Splice onto Arcane {R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Jiwari, the Earth Aflame
Oni of Wild Places
card.property: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purr from the rumbling depths of nightmare.

card.name: Path of Anger's Flame
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walking the path of the kami only leaves you with singed feet." —Soratami saying

card.name: Rally the Horde
card.property: Exile the top card of your library. Exile the top card of your library. Exile the top card of your library. If the last card exiled isn't a land card, repeat this process. Create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token for each nonland card exiled this way.

card.name: Ronin Cavekeeper
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The akki were surprised to encounter a human who could fight in the caves as well as they.

card.name: Shinen of Fury's Fire
card.property: Haste Channel — {R}, Discard Shinen of Fury's Fire: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Skyfire Kirin
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain control of target creature with that spell's converted mana cost until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fiery visitation burns away the fog of war and dissipates the ties of loyalty.

card.name: Sokenzan Renegade
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more cards in hand than each other player, the player who has the most cards in hand gains control of Sokenzan Renegade.

card.name: Sokenzan Spellblade
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}{R}: Sokenzan Spellblade gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Spiraling Embers
card.property: Spiraling Embers deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The akki knew to stay indoors on the days the oni flew their kites.

card.name: Sunder from Within
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trapped for eons within the sacred gong, the kami boomed and clanged to a deafening tempo as they destroyed their erstwhile prison.

card.name: Thoughts of Ruin
card.property: Each player sacrifices a land for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In our war with the kami, we annihilate what is our own. Do they too suffer ruination in their hidden world?" —Diary of Azusa

card.name: Undying Flames
card.property: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. Undying Flames deals damage to any target equal to that card's converted mana cost. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Yuki-Onna
card.property: When Yuki-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Yuki-Onna to its owner's hand.

card.name: Arashi, the Sky Asunder
Ayumi, the Last Visitor
card.property: Legendary landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a legendary land.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before Shinka's walls were built, before the torii at Okina stood, she was there, tall and proud against the sky, and she will be there long after they have fallen into dust.

card.name: Bounteous Kirin
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain life equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most benevolent and life-giving of kami joined the war against the mortal world, but only with heavy and sorrowful hearts.

card.name: Briarknit Kami
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One thorn to warn, ten thorns to defend, a hundred thorns to destroy.

card.name: Dense Canopy
card.property: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The orochi learned how to move swiftly and surely along the forest floor, like fish darting through gull-watched waters.

card.name: Descendant of Masumaro
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.

card.name: Dosan's Oldest Chant
card.property: You gain 6 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Dosan's chant grew in volume, a second, deeper voice rose up in harmony behind it, strong enough to shake the earth and yet vibrant enough to fill the spirit.

card.name: Elder Pine of Jukai
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Soulshift 2 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Endless Swarm
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token for each card in your hand. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

card.name: Fiddlehead Kami
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, regenerate Fiddlehead Kami.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a riddle, it unwinds. Like a green wind, it reaches out. Like a sudden guilt, it seizes." —Snow Fur, kitsune poet

card.name: Ghost-Lit Nourisher
Haru-Onna
card.property: When Haru-Onna enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Haru-Onna to its owner's hand.

card.name: Inner Calm, Outer Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ghostly objects around the kami circled faster and faster, creating a dizzying cyclone of motion. When it opened its eyes, it struck.

card.name: Kami of the Tended Garden
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kami of the Tended Garden unless you pay {G}. Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Kashi-Tribe Elite
card.property: Legendary Snakes you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) Whenever Kashi-Tribe Elite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Masumaro, First to Live
card.property: Masumaro, First to Live's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the waning moments of war, humanity's most ancient ancestors return. But whose side shall they make their own?" —Isao, Enlightened Bushi

card.name: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker
card.property: Whenever Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. {G}: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Molting Skin
card.property: Return Molting Skin to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have learned much from the orochi."

card.name: Nightsoil Kami
card.property: Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Okina Nightwatch
card.property: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Okina Nightwatch gets +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the most skilled budoka could protect the Okina Shrine. Only the best of these protectors took the night watch.

card.name: Promised Kannushi
card.property: Soulshift 7 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Reki, the History of Kamigawa
card.property: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After his death, monks spent ten years transcribing the tattoos from Reki's body and gathering stories from those who spoke with him. Thus the volume you hold was written." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Rending Vines
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Sakura-Tribe Scout
card.property: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scouts of the Sakura Tribe spent two years wandering the forest to learn every leaf and tree. That knowledge was called upon during the Kami War to ensure the orochi's survival." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Sasaya, Orochi Ascendant
card.property: Reveal your hand: If you have seven or more land cards in your hand, flip Sasaya, Orochi Ascendant.

alternate.name: Sasaya's Essence
alternate.property: Whenever a land you control is tapped for mana, add an additional one mana of any type that land produced for each other land you control with the same name as it.

card.name: Seed the Land
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, its controller creates a 1/1 green Snake creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With a sadness and a sense of hope, Senka left the colony of her birth and, with her attendants, set out to serve as broodmistress, founder of a new colony.

card.name: Seek the Horizon
card.property: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen this great land from every angle. I know its every tree, stone, and river bend. Yet I have come to realize that knowing a thing is not the same as healing it." —Diary of Azusa

card.name: Sekki, Seasons' Guide
card.property: Sekki, Seasons' Guide enters the battlefield with eight +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Sekki, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Sekki, and create that many 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens. Sacrifice eight Spirits: Return Sekki from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Shinen of Life's Roar
card.property: All creatures able to block Shinen of Life's Roar do so. Channel — {2}{G}{G}, Discard Shinen of Life's Roar: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Stampeding Serow
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Iname as One
card.property: When Iname as One enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a Spirit permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. When Iname as One dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target Spirit permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Ashes of the Fallen
card.property: As Ashes of the Fallen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Each creature card in your graveyard has the chosen creature type in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ashes of the dead mingle with the soil, and both become as one.

card.name: Blood Clock
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand unless they pay 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In an age of war, time is measured not by sand but by blood.

card.name: Ebony Owl Netsuke
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has seven or more cards in hand, Ebony Owl Netsuke deals 4 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Owls filled the skies during the Kami War, harbingers of darker times to come." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Ivory Crane Netsuke
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the feathers of a crane are clouds, plucked and sewn together by the hands of the kami.

card.name: Manriki-Gusari
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has "{T}: Destroy target Equipment." Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: O-Naginata
card.property: O-Naginata can be attached only to a creature with power 3 or greater. Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Pithing Needle
card.property: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

card.name: Scroll of Origins
card.property: {2}, {T}: Draw a card if you have seven or more cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The words from which language sprang, the knowledge from which thought was born, the story from which history was woven.

card.name: Soratami Cloud Chariot
card.property: {2}: Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. {2}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

card.name: Wine of Blood and Iron
card.property: {4}: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. Sacrifice Wine of Blood and Iron at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Godo never revealed what went into his special brew, but he always had more of it after great victories.

card.name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed." —Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

card.name: Miren, the Moaning Well
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Oboro, Palace in the Clouds
card.property: {T}: Add {U}. {1}: Return Oboro, Palace in the Clouds to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Here the soratami wove their endless plots—graceful, artful, and deceitful, while the unwitting world moved below.

card.name: Tomb of Urami
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. Tomb of Urami deals 1 damage to you if you don't control an Ogre. {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice all lands you control: Create Urami, a legendary 5/5 black Demon Spirit creature token with flying.
